attributes.action: STOP GARLIC BEING PUT IN MOST OF OUR FOOD PRODUCTS
attributes.additional_details:
Too many prepared foods today contain Garlic it is becoming a common ingredient to the displeasure of those who dislike it or to those who are allergic to it.
Often you will see the term ' Improved Recipe ' this is usually shorthand for Garlic has been added making it one more product to avoid if you don't want to eat Garlic, thus restricting the choice of foods to purchase even further for those who do not want Garlic in everything !
The government needs to instruct the food industry to moderate its use of Garlic in food products.
